short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load custom subtitles for YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to load custom SRT subtitle files for YouTube videos. I made it with an AI after being unable to find a working subtitle loader extension online. Since it is useful to me, I believe others will derive some use from it as well.

How to use:
1. Open a YouTube video.
2. Click the extension.
3. Upload your SRT file.

Features:
• Simple UI
• Upload SRT files for any YouTube video
• Customize subtitle appearance (size, color, position)
• Works with YouTube's standard video player

No data is collected.
